bug.short_desc: qx.ui.form.TextField unreachable in IE8 by mouse

long_desc.thetext:
In some case the TextField does not get focus when clicked with the mouse. The same problem happens with qx.ui.form.PasswordField.
An example of the wrong behaviour is in the demo page http://demo.qooxdoo.org/current/demobrowser/#animation~Login.html
The bug regards only the standard mode of IE8.
